text: te allaha mate ja dareka prakarani prasansa che, jene akaso ane dharatinum sarjana karyum je ane be-be, trana-trana ane cara-cara pankhovala pharista'one potana sandesavahaka banavanara che. Te sarjanamam jevi rite icche vadharo kare che, ni:Sanka allaha ta'ala dareka vastu para sakti dharave che
